title: Quickbeam, Bregalad (6C33)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Companion • Ent
Strength:	8
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Game Text:	Quickbeam's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent and unbound Hobbit you can spot.
Lore:	”'But if we stayed home and did nothing, doom would find us anyway, sooner or later.'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Like other similar cards, this card's game text should say “Ent or unbound Hobbit. ” For each Ent or each unbound Hobbit, the twilight cost is -1.
